Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    FileUtils class of static constants and basic file checking routines. This is the header file of constants and methods that might be used in any and all contexts. Methods: public static void CheckArgs(int countArgs,String [] args,String usage) public static void CloseFile(PrintWriter theFile) public static void CloseFile(Scanner theFile) public static void CloseLogFile() public static PrintWriter PrintWriterOpen(String outFileName) public static PrintWriter PrintWriterOpen(String outFileName) public static Scanner ScannerOpen(String inFileName) public static void SetLogFile(String logFileName) public static void SetLogFile(PrintWriter logFile)
    Version:
    1.00 Copyright Duncan A. Buell 1 May 2011
    Author:
    Duncan Buell

      • CheckArgs

        public static void CheckArgs(int countArgs,
             java.lang.String[] args,
             java.lang.String usage)
        Method to check the number of arguments to the main.
        Parameters:
        countArgs - the number of required arguments
        args - the argument list at the time the class is invoked
        usage - descriptions of the required arguments

      • CloseFile

        public static void CloseFile(java.io.PrintWriter theFile)
        Method to close a PrintWriter file.
        Parameters:
        theFile - the PrintWriter file to close.

      • CloseFile

        public static void CloseFile(java.util.Scanner theFile)
        Method to close a Scanner file.
        Parameters:
        theFile - The Scanner file to close.

      • CloseLogFile

        public static void CloseLogFile()
        Method to close the PrintWriter class log file.

      • PrintWriterOpen

        public static java.io.PrintWriter PrintWriterOpen(java.lang.String outFileName)
        PrintWriterOpen method to open a file as a PrintWriter. The main purpose of this method is to do the error checking in a subordinate method so as not to clutter up the code flow in methods that have to open files.
        Parameters:
        outFileName - the String name of the file to open
        Returns:
        The opened PrintWriter known to be not null

      • ScannerOpen

        public static java.util.Scanner ScannerOpen(java.lang.String inFileName)
        ScannerOpen method to open a file as a Scanner. The main purpose of this method is to do the error checking in a subordinate method so as not to clutter up the code flow in methods that have to open files.
        Parameters:
        inFileName - the String name of the file to open
        Returns:
        The opened Scanner known to be not null

      • SetLogFile

        public static void SetLogFile(java.lang.String logFileName)
        Method to set the logFile given the name of the file.
        Parameters:
        logFileName - the String name of the log file.

      • SetLogFile

        public static void SetLogFile(java.io.PrintWriter logFile)
        Method to set the logFile given the PrintWriter file.
        Parameters:
        logFile - the PrintWriter log file.

      • StringToDouble

        public static java.lang.Double StringToDouble(java.lang.String ss,
                              java.lang.Double value)
        Method to convert a string to a double with error checking.
        Parameters:
        ss - the String value to convert.
        value - the default value for an empty string.
        Returns:
        the converted value as a Double.

      • StringToInteger

        public static java.lang.Integer StringToInteger(java.lang.String ss,
                                java.lang.Integer value)
        Method to convert a string to an integer with error checking.
        Parameters:
        ss - the String value to convert.
        value - the default value for an empty string.
        Returns:
        the converted value as an Integer.
